import React from "react"; // plugin de reação para criar notificações no painel // reactstrap componentes import { Alert, UncontrolledAlert, Button, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; class Suporte extends React.Component { notify = place => { var color = Math.floor(Math.random() * 5 + 1); var type; switch (color) { case 1: type = "primary"; break; case 2: type = "success"; break; case 3: type = "danger"; break; case 4: type = "warning"; break; case 5: type = "info"; break; default: break; } var options = {}; options = { place: place, message: (
Welcome to Black Dashboard React - a beautiful freebie for every web developer.
), type: type, icon: "tim-icons icon-bell-55", autoDismiss: 7 }; this.refs.notificationAlert.notificationAlert(options); }; render() { return ( <>
Notificações This is a plain notification This is a notification with close button. This is a notification with close button and icon. This is a notification with close button and icon and have many lines. You can see that the icon and the close button are always vertically aligned. This is a beautiful notification. So you don't have to worry about the style. Estados de notificação Primeiro - This is a regular notification made with ".alert-primary" Info - This is a regular notification made with ".alert-info" Success - This is a regular notification made with ".alert-success" Warning - This is a regular notification made with ".alert-warning" Danger - This is a regular notification made with ".alert-danger"
Notifications Places

); } } export default Suporte;
